item.title: Chicago Bulls 2023/24 City Edition
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Our City Edition Collection celebrates the bond between a team and the town they call home. Inspired by iconic city symbols and past Chicago Bulls kits, this tee highlights the unique cultures, communities and history that set Chicago apart. Dropped shoulders, longer sleeves and a roomy fit through the body and hips give the Max90 tee a relaxed and casual look.

  • Colour Shown: Black
  • Style: FN1999-010

The post Chicago Bulls 2023/24 City Edition appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Our City Edition Collection celebrates the bond between a team and the town they call home. Inspired by iconic city symbols and past Chicago Bulls kits, this tee highlights the unique cultures, communities and history that set Chicago apart. Dropped shoulders, longer sleeves and a roomy fit through the body and hips give the Max90 tee a relaxed and casual look.

 

Product details

  • 50–100% cotton/0–20% polyester
  • Materials percentages may vary. Check label for actual content.
  • Machine wash
  • Imported
  • Colour Shown: Black
  • Style: FN1999-010
  • Country/Region of Origin: Mexico

item.title: Nike Air
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
You'll want to keep this loose-fitting tee within easy reach. Retro branding and sport-inspired details are paired with neutral colours to make it an easy-styling essential.

  • Colour Shown: White
  • Style: FN7723-100

The post Nike Air appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
You’ll want to keep this loose-fitting tee within easy reach. Retro branding and sport-inspired details are paired with neutral colours to make it an easy-styling essential.

 

Benefits

  • Slightly dropped shoulders and a loose fit provide a comfortable, confident feel.
  • Heavyweight cotton fabric has a stiff drape and structured feel.

 

Product details

  • Ribbed neckband
  • Body: 100% cotton. Rib: 97% cotton/3% elastane.
  • Machine wash
  • Imported
  • Colour Shown: White
  • Style: FN7723-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

The post Nike Air appeared first on .

item.title: Nike Ready
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
The sweat-wicking Ready Top keeps you fresh for all your fitness activities. It's cut with a relaxed fit with quick-drying, breathable fabric to help you stay cool when your workout heats up. Plus, it has angled sleeves for better movement, whether you're lifting at the gym or stretching outside.

  • Colour Shown: Black/Cool Grey/White
  • Style: DV9815-010

The post Nike Ready appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
The sweat-wicking Ready Top keeps you fresh for all your fitness activities. It’s cut with a relaxed fit with quick-drying, breathable fabric to help you stay cool when your workout heats up. Plus, it has angled sleeves for better movement, whether you’re lifting at the gym or stretching outside.

 

Benefits

  • Nike Dri-FIT technology moves sweat away from your skin for quicker evaporation, helping you stay dry and comfortable.
  • Breathable mesh fabric helps keep you cool.
  • Raglan sleeves are angled so you get the most out of your arm movement.
  • Flat stitching feels smooth against the skin.

 

Product Details

  • 92% polyester/8% elastane
  • Machine wash
  • Imported
  • Colour Shown: Black/Cool Grey/White
  • Style: DV9815-010
  • Country/Region of Origin: Sri Lanka,Indonesia,Jordan

The post Nike Ready appeared first on .

item.title: Luka 2
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
You bring the speed. We'll bring the stability. The Luka 2 is built to support your skills, with an emphasis on step-backs, side-steps and quick-stop action. A stacked midsole features firm, flexible cushioning for added responsiveness as you shift back and forth on the court. Up top, the full-foot wrapped cage design helps you stay contained whether you're faking out a defender or driving down the lane. With all that tech in a lightweight package, we've got efficiency covered. The rest is up to you.

  • Colour Shown: Wolf Grey/Black/Hyper Jade/Speed Yellow
  • Style: DX8733-007

The post Luka 2 appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
You bring the speed. We’ll bring the stability. The Luka 2 is built to support your skills, with an emphasis on step-backs, side-steps and quick-stop action. A stacked midsole features firm, flexible cushioning for added responsiveness as you shift back and forth on the court. Up top, the full-foot wrapped cage design helps you stay contained whether you’re faking out a defender or driving down the lane. With all that tech in a lightweight package, we’ve got efficiency covered. The rest is up to you.

 

Cushioned for Impact

When you’re shifting side to side, you need support that’s firm—but not rigid. A wedge of cushioning in the midsole butts up against the medial sidewall so you can bank like a champ, and a thick, moulded insole helps you stay grounded.

 

Last-Step Efficiency

The other aspect of side-to-side movement? Lateral support. To help your quick stops feel secure, we added a strong, flexible plate that runs up the lateral side wall, complemented by a firm foam carrier and Formula 23 foam in the midsole.

 

360 Degrees of Support

A sturdy cage wraps around the entire upper for 360-degree connected support that help your feet stay securely contained, whichever way you step—or however quick you stop.

The post Luka 2 appeared first on .

item.title: Air Jordan 1 Low G
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Feel unbeatable, from the tee box to the final putt. Inspired by one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, the Air Jordan 1 G is an instant classic on the course. With Air cushioning underfoot, a Wings logo on the heel and an integrated traction pattern to help you power through your swing, it delivers all the clubhouse cool of the original AJ1—plus everything you need to play 18 holes in comfort.

  • Colour Shown: White/Varsity Red/Obsidian
  • Style: DD9315-113

The post Air Jordan 1 Low G appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
AN ’85 ICON REMADE FOR THE COURSE.

 

Feel unbeatable, from the tee box to the final putt. Inspired by one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, the Air Jordan 1 G is an instant classic on the course. With Air cushioning underfoot, a Wings logo on the heel and an integrated traction pattern to help you power through your swing, it delivers all the clubhouse cool of the original AJ1—plus everything you need to play 18 holes in comfort.

 

Stitch-for-Stitch Construction

Genuine leather and bold colour-blocking recreate the classic look.

 

Air Cushioning

Encapsulated Air in the heel cushions every step.

 

Heritage Traction

Based on the design of the original outsole, the integrated traction pattern includes a forefoot pivot circle.

 

Product Details

  • One-year waterproof warranty
  • Colour Shown: White/Varsity Red/Obsidian
  • Style: DD9315-113
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

The post Air Jordan 1 Low G appeared first on .

item.title: Air Jordan 9 G
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Welcome to the links, legend. We drew direct inspiration from the '93 classic released during MJ's first year in retirement and gave it a golf update. A memory foam insole and synthetic leather tongue highlight a low-top design worthy of statues, swing-throughs and clean ball strikes that ultimately land gently on the green.

  • Colour Shown: White/Black/True Red
  • Style: FJ5934-100

The post Air Jordan 9 G appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the links, legend. We drew direct inspiration from the ’93 classic released during MJ’s first year in retirement and gave it a golf update. A memory foam insole and synthetic leather tongue highlight a low-top design worthy of statues, swing-throughs and clean ball strikes that ultimately land gently on the green.

 

Soft ride

We upgraded the insole to a memory foam that sits directly under your foot for extra cushioning, made to walk 18 holes or more. The full-length foam offers the soft, supportive ride you’ve come to expect in Jordan Golf.

 

Comfortable and clean

The synthetic leather tongue offers comfort against your ankle. It’s easy to clean after a wade through the rough or tall grass.

 

Stay dry

The waterproof layers help keep your feet dry and warm when the elements turn.

 

Traction for the course

A strong plastic plate comes with 7 removable Champs spikes to give you traction for the course.

 

Level of stability

We attached a leather strip to the back of the sole to add a level of stability when swinging through the ball.

 

Product details

  • 2-year waterproof warranty
  • Cushioned insole
  • Colour Shown: White/Black/True Red
  • Style: FJ5934-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

The post Air Jordan 9 G appeared first on .

item.title: Zion 3 ‘Gen Zion’
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
Take the classic combo of black and white and infuse it with some youthful energy. The result: this special edition Zion 3. Check out those colourful pops. Feel the court-ready tech. And that icy outsole? It's over.

  • Colour Shown: Black/Laser Orange/Citron Pulse/White
  • Style: DR0675-018

The post Zion 3 ‘Gen Zion’ appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Take the classic combo of black and white and infuse it with some youthful energy. The result: this special edition Zion 3. Check out those colourful pops. Feel the court-ready tech. And that icy outsole? It’s over.

 

Lateral action

Side to side, left to right. Herringbone traction on the outsole helps you grip the court with every step, while a foam carrier in the midsole adds support for your ankle and heel.

 

Up fast, down hard

Nike Air helps you get those powerful ups when you blast off the court—and adds cushioning on re-entry.

 

Get low

For improved ground feel, we dropped in some Formula 23 foam. It’s soft and responsive underfoot, helping you stay low in your movements.

The post Zion 3 ‘Gen Zion’ appeared first on .

item.title: Jordan True Flight
item.dc:creator: zeelpatel
item.description:
The Jordan True Flight takes design elements from the AJ7 to create a sneaker that brings a classic performance look to streetwear. The iconic red and black colour combo features premium leather structured around an internal sleeve, for a secure fit that's easy to get on and off.

  • Colour Shown: Black/University Red/White/Chrome
  • Style: CU4933-001

The post Jordan True Flight appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
SIGNATURE DETAILS WITH A PERFORMANCE PEDIGREE.

 

The Jordan True Flight takes design elements from the AJ7 to create a sneaker that brings a classic performance look to streetwear. The iconic red and black colour combo features premium leather structured around an internal sleeve, for a secure fit that’s easy to get on and off.

 

Benefits

  • Leather and synthetic leather in the upper provide durability and structure.
  • Full-length, Air-Sole unit provides lightweight cushioning.
  • The inner sleeve offers a secure, comfortable fit.

 

Product Details

  • Foam sole
  • Rubber traction
  • Heel pull loop
  • Collar cutouts
  • Colour Shown: Black/University Red/White/Chrome
  • Style: CU4933-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

The post Jordan True Flight appeared first on .
